long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension will show the most part of current live caption in Twitter Space as a preliminary, tentative measure to expand the visible area in a separate area. Version 0.0.1.0 will show all the captions that include previously captioned lines. Version 0.0.1.2 automatically start space and its capturing of caption upon the availability of a space shown as outer circle of Twitter profile. The option is configurable under "Auto start space...".
